terms.title: Service Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: This agreement governs the relationship between PT Nada Freedom Indonesia (hereinafter referred to as 'NFI') as the service provider and you as the Customer. By registering for or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to all the terms set forth below.
terms.section1_content: NFI provides internet access based on Fiber Optic (FTTH/FTTB) and Wireless infrastructure. Services include device installation up to the demarcation point (ONT/Router). The Customer understands that internet speeds are 'Up To' (shared bandwidth) unless otherwise specified in a Dedicated Service contract.
terms.section2_content: Customers must maintain the confidentiality of network passwords and are responsible for all activities occurring through their account. It is strictly prohibited to use NFI services for: (a) Hacking or illegal access; (b) Distribution of copyright-infringing or pornographic content; (c) Reselling bandwidth to other parties without written permission from NFI.
terms.section3_content: Subscription fees are paid regularly every month. Invoices will be issued 7 days before the due date (every 10th of the month). If payment is not received by the due date, NFI reserves the right to automatically isolate the service without further notice. Re-connection fees or late payment penalties may apply depending on the selected package.
terms.section4_content: NFI targets a service availability level of 99.9% per month. Disruptions due to 'Force Majeure' (natural disasters, mass sabotage, international undersea cable cuts) are excluded from this guarantee. NFI reserves the right to perform scheduled network maintenance during low traffic periods (00:00 - 05:00 WIB) to ensure maximum performance.
terms.section5_content: All trademarks, logos, and network technologies are the legal property of PT Nada Freedom Indonesia. NFI is committed to protecting Customer personal data and will not provide it to any third party, unless required by law or official request from Indonesian law enforcement agencies.
terms.section6_content: Customers wishing to unsubscribe must provide notification at least 14 days before the end of the next billing cycle. ONT/Modem devices provided by NFI must be returned in good condition. Damage to or loss of such devices will be subject to replacement costs according to the applicable rates.
terms.contact_text: For further legal consultation or technical assistance regarding these policies, please contact our team at info@nfi.net.id or visit our head office in Karawang.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: These are the most commonly asked questions about NFI. Can't find what you're looking for?
faq.no_data: No questions found in this category.

questions.q1: Is my area covered by the network?
questions.a1: Currently, we cover major areas. However, our network is constantly expanding. Please send your location via our admin WhatsApp for an accurate technical check.
questions.q2: What are the requirements to register?
questions.a2: It's quite simple! Attach a photo of your ID card (KTP), an active mobile number (WhatsApp), and the full installation address. Our team will process your data within 24 hours.
questions.q3: Which package is suitable for my needs?
questions.a3:
10-20 Mbps: 1-3 devices (Chat, Browsing).
30-50 Mbps: 4-7 devices (HD Streaming, Zoom).
100 Mbps+: Gamers & Offices (4K Streaming).
questions.q4: Is there an initial installation fee?
questions.a4: We offer Free Installation for certain promotions (e.g., 3 months payment in advance). For regular monthly plans, standard installation fees apply according to the terms.
questions.q5: When is the monthly payment due date?
questions.a5: The due date is the 10th of every month. Billing invoices will be sent automatically via WhatsApp or Email 7 days before that date.
questions.a6: We accept Bank Transfers (Virtual Account), E-Wallets (GoPay, OVO, Dana), and cash payments through Alfamart/Indomaret outlets.
questions.q7: Can I upgrade my speed later?
questions.a7: Of course. You can request a service upgrade at any time through Customer Service. Speed changes will be active immediately after admin confirmation.
questions.q8: Is this internet Unlimited or is there an FUP?
questions.a8: Our service is True Unlimited with no FUP (Fair Usage Policy). You can surf as much as you want without worrying about speed reduction (throttling) in the middle of the month.
questions.q9: Why does my internet feel slow?
questions.a9: Ensure the number of devices does not exceed the package capacity. Try restarting the modem (turn off for 5 minutes, then turn on). If it's still slow, contact our technicians.
questions.q10: How do I change the WiFi password?
questions.a10: Access router settings via browser (Standard IP: 192.168.1.1). If you have difficulty, our support team can guide you or change it from the central system (remote).
questions.q11: What does the red light (LOS) on the modem mean?
questions.a11: A red/LOS light indicates a physical disturbance on the fiber cable (broken/bent) or a central outage. Please report to CS immediately so a technician can come to fix it.

troubleshoot.title: First Aid
troubleshoot.subtitle: Troubleshooting
troubleshoot.desc: Before contacting a technician, try the following **Power Cycle** steps. This method effectively resolves 90% of slow or unstable connection issues.

step1.title: 1. Turn Off Modem
step1.desc: Unplug the modem's power adapter or press the power button. Wait 10 seconds.

step2.title: 2. Wait 1 Minute
step2.desc: Let the device cool down for a moment to reset the internal system cache.

step3.title: 3. Turn On Again
step3.desc: Plug the power back in. Wait 2-3 minutes until all indicator lights are stable green.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At PT Nada Freedom Indonesia (NFI), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our fiber network services and website.
privacy.contact_intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our home packages, or contact customer support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, physical address, and payment information. We also automatically collect technical data regarding your network usage to ensure stability and quality of service.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our fiber network services. This includes processing transactions, identifying network issues, sending you technical notices or updates, and responding to your comments and questions. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

sections.title: 3. Network Security & Data Protection
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our web service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

sections.title: 5. Third-Party Service Providers
sections.content: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service (e.g., payment processors, maintenance services). These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

sections.title: 6. Your Data Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you. Whenever made possible, you can access, update, or request deletion of your Personal Data directly within your account settings section or by contacting us.
